Background

Hi My name is Matt DiStefano. I grew up in Central MA. Afterwards I headed north to NH to attend the University of New Hampshire, majoring in Communication and minoring in Business with a focus in Marketing.

After graduation, I worked at the Inbound Marketing software company HubSpot, on their inside sales team. It was in this experience where I caught the startup bug and met a lot of great people. Someday I would love to start my own company, but for now I am looking forward to the opportunity to help a startup grow.
